participant_1.background:
I love eating McDonald's french fries, but I never tell my parents because they think they are unhealthy.
i make my own compost.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
I enjoy the sweet taste of mangoes.
I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories.
we drink beer and eat food.
My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing.
I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.

content.text: Hello there! My name is Emily! What's yours?
My name is participant_1. Nice to meet you, Emily!
Nice to meet you too, participant_2! Where are you from?
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
Ice cream is delicious! I love eating it with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have a family that is very supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
That's wonderful to hear! My family is really important to me, too. I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories with them.
That sounds exciting! I've always wanted to travel the world, but I've never had the chance.
It's definitely worth it! I'm looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.
That's really sweet of you! I hope you find a great home soon!
